issue.title: [C++] Remove unused hashing routines
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6468](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6468). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The adoption of xxh3 for hashing (in ARROW-6385) probably left around some specialized but unused hashing functions (e.g. CRC-based hashing, perhaps also murmurhash). We should probably remove them if no problem surfaces with xxh3.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6468?focusedCommentId=16946345) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5591
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5591>
